faqSection.sectionDescription: If you have any questions, the answer might be here!

faqs.question: What is readhub?
faqs.answer: readhub is a platform that offers both physical and digital books across various categories to provide a comprehensive and enjoyable reading experience.

faqs.question: How can I buy a book?
faqs.answer: You can browse books through the dedicated section, choose the one you like, then click 'Buy' to proceed with the purchase.

faqs.question: Are there free books available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a collection of free books you can download at no cost. Look for the 'Free' category in our store.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach out to our support team through the Contact page or via the email address provided at the bottom of the site.

faqs.question: Do you support Arabic language?
faqs.answer: Yes! We support both English and Arabic. You can switch languages using the language button in the header.

LoginPage.title: Welcome Back
LoginPage.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

about.title: About readhub
about.description: Your one-stop destination for both physical and digital books. Discover new worlds through reading.

newsletter.title: Newsletter

faqPage.sectionDescription: If you have any questions, the answer might be here!

faqs.question: What is readhub?
faqs.answer: readhub is a platform that offers both physical and digital books across various categories to provide a comprehensive and enjoyable reading experience.

faqs.question: How can I buy a book?
faqs.answer: You can browse books through the dedicated section, choose the one you like, then click 'Buy' to proceed with the purchase.

faqs.question: Are there free books available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a collection of free books you can download at no cost. Look for the 'Free' category in our store.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach out to our support team through the Contact page or via the email address provided at the bottom of the site.

faqs.question: Do you support Arabic language?
faqs.answer: Yes! We support both English and Arabic. You can switch languages using the language button in the header.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Shipping usually takes between 3 to 7 business days depending on your location.

faqs.question: Can I return a book after purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can return physical books within 14 days of delivery if they are in original condition.

faqs.question: Are there discounts for bulk purchases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing and discounts for bulk orders. Contact our sales team for more information.

faqs.question: Is my payment information secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment details.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds for digital books?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, due to the nature of digital products, we do not offer refunds for downloaded eBooks.

BookPage.We'd love to hear your review: We'd love to hear your review
